content.raw:
When selecting "View->Joints" in gazebo, the orientation shown for the joints are incorrect, and different from what is shown by RViz as a TF. 

RViz shows the correct orientation, while all the orientations of the robot seem to be matching the world's orientation, but then will move along with the robot. 

The errors can really be seen in the hands. I'm not sure if this is because their is something specifically wrong with the hands, or if all the others just happen to start at the same orientation as the world. (I am assuming the latter).
